item.description:
"After taking countless Brewery tours from around the world, we decided to focus our tours on what we feel is the best part of any brewery tour - the sampling. That being said, we offer the Harpoon Tastings at the Brewery. Our Tasting takes place in our Tasting Room and includes in-depth information about Harpoon and the great beers we brew. This information is narrated by our knowledgable staff and includes complimentary samples of our delicious beer. That Tasting lasts about 1 hour which includes access the the Brewhouse Platform. Because of our small size, we do not have the ability to allow people to walk through the brewery."

http://www.harpoonbre...

If you like the taste of beer, this will be fun.

The tour itself should be done within 2 hours, then we will head down to the Barking Crab, which is just next door, for some clam chowder and shrimp scampi. After a snack we will then head over to the Middle East for the Hoodoo Gurus gig.

I'm not too familiar with the layout of the brewery so let's just aim to meet at the front door at 3:45pm. Tour starts at 4pm. Don't be late or all the beer might be gone when you arrive.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Harpoon Brewery tour
